data.title: Rahul Mahajan's ex-wife Dimpy shares throwback pic of her wedding on third anniversary
data.meta_description: After former Bigg Boss contestant Rahul Mahajan announced his third wedding with Kazakhstan model Natalya Ilina on November 20, his ex-wife Dimpy Mahajan took to social media to share throwback pics of her second wedding with Rohit Roy on her third anniversary.
data.text:
After former Bigg Boss contestant Rahul Mahajan announced his third wedding with Kazakhstan model Natalya Ilina on November 20, his ex-wife Dimpy Mahajan took to social media to share throwback pics of her second wedding with Rohit Roy on her third anniversary.

"And I would choose you in a hundred lifetimes, in a hundred worlds, in any version of reality, I would find you, and I would choose you! Happy anniversary baby! #happy3rd," she wrote.

Also read | Rahul Mahajan on third marriage: My previous marriages happened in a hurry

Dimpy and Rohit became parents to a cute baby girl Reanna in June 2016.

Dimpy accused her first husband Rahul of domestic violence after nearly four years of her wedding. She had got married to him on reality show Rahul Dulhaniya Le Jaayega.

"My previous two marriages happened in a hurry. There was no time to think and though both Shweta and Dimpy are wonderful individuals, we were not not compatible. Over the last few years, I realised that I don't want to be in a relationship for the sake of it. I don't want to be with someone where there is no way forward. With Natalya, I discovered true companionship and also, there's no room for long arguments or differences between us," Rahul had said about his failed marriages.
